text: Hi! This slack is for helping to contribute to base R code (the language itself). If your question is about this then yes. If it is about using it, then I recommend the r-help mailing list or other sites such as stack overflow, or support sites of rOpenSci or Posit.

elements.text: Hi! This slack is for helping to contribute to base R code (the language itself). If your question is about this then yes. If it is about using it, then I recommend the r-help mailing list or other sites such as stack overflow, or support sites of rOpenSci or Posit.

text: Hello guys! I'm a research assistant in Econometrics at Sciences Po and I am relatively new to R programming. Yet, so far I have had the opportunity of contributing to a few packages and I have become very excited about the open source aspect of R compared to other languages. So, I hope to learn a lot from discussions in this platform and thanks your vital contribution to the econometrics community!
